price: Mélòó mélòó nínú àwọn ìjọ tí A ti parẹ́ ṣíwájú wọn. Wọ́n sì ní agbára jù wọ́n lọ. (Nígbà tí ìyà dé) wọ́n sá àsálà kiri nínú ìlú. Ǹjẹ́ ibùsásí kan wà (fún wọn bí?)
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum baṭshan fanaqqabū fī al-bilādi hal min maḥīṣin
